CustomField.description: NICC-023347 The 18 character Salesforce Id of the attachment record related to this integration message. This field is updated when attachments are sent as part of the integration.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The 18 character Salesforce Id of the attachment record related to this integration message. This field is updated when attachments are sent as part of the integration.
CustomField.label: Attachment Id
